entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
